refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ctrlproxyd is a helper daemon for ctrlproxy that authenticates incoming connections and connects to a ctrlproxy instance or starts ctrlproxy for the user that connected.
Log messages will be written to syslog, unless ctrlproxyd is running in the foreground, in which case they will be written to standard error.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: ctrlproxy recognizes the following command-line options

listitem.para: Communicate on standard input/output - for use with the internet superserver (inetd).
Read the configuration file from the specified FILE instead of from /etc/ctrlproxyd.conf.
Show help message with short argument information
Log ctrlproxy messages to specified file.
